item.title: Mathematical and numerical modelling of the circadian oscillator
item.description: Reference V Golubyatnikov, A Akinshin, N Ayupova, N Kirillova, N Podkolodnyy, O Podkolodnaya “Mathematical and numerical modelling of the circadian oscillator” (2022) // Bioinformatics of Genome Regulation and Structure/Systems Biology (BGRS/SB-2022).
